original_text: And a certain man lame from his mother's womb was carried, whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful, to ask alms of them that entered into the temple;
korean_text: 나면서 못 걷게 된 이를 사람들이 메고 오니 이는 성전에 들어가는 사람들에게 구걸하기 위하여 날마다 미문이라는 성전 문에 두는 자라

sentences.original_text: And a certain man lame from his mother's womb
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어머니 뱃속부터 절뚝거리던 어떤 사람이 있었는데

sentences.original_text: at the gate of the temple
of them that entered into the temple
